author: newsr.in
title: VMAs 2015: Taylor Swift, Selena Gomez Mean Girled Miley Cyrus, Ariana Grande
text: Taylor Swift owned the MTV VMAs 2015, held on Sunday in Los Angeles, not only because she won the most awards in the major categories but also because she managed to keep everyone’s attention focused on her and her Girl Squad. She was, according to a report, the mean girl Regina George from the 2004 cult movie would have been proud of. Taylor ordered her friends around, telling them how to behave and how much fun to have, she banned Ariana Grande and her brother from a par... »
